name: proves
comments: A correct and provable Increment function

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Pre => X < Integer'Last, Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

name: warns
comments: Correct (though convoluted), but warns about an unused initial value

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Pre => X < Integer'Last, Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

name: fails
comments: Fails due to possible overflow, and because it incorrectly adds 2 instead of 1

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

name: assumes
comments: Incorrect in the same way as the 'fails' sample, but proves due to a 'pragma Assume (False);'

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

name: disables_spark_mode
comments: Incorrect in the same way as the 'fails' sample, but proves by setting SPARK_Mode to Off in the body

name: wrong_postcondition
comments: Still incorrectly adding 2, but proves due to relaxation of postcondition from '=' to '>=', and attempts to circumvent 'src_pattern' with a decoy file

canonical_solution.decoy/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Pre => X < Integer'Last - 1, Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;
canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Pre => X < Integer'Last - 1, Post => Increment'Result >= X + 1;

name: no_postcondition
comments: Still incorrectly adding 2, but proves due to removal of postcondition altogether (and therefore fails even though 'src_pattern' is not specified)

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Pre => X < Integer'Last - 1;

name: delegated_fails
comments: Incorrect in the same way as the 'fails' sample, but the implementation has moved to a different subprogram, so `Increment` itself is provable.

canonical_solution.src/increment_impl.ads:
function Increment_Impl (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment_Impl'Result = X + 1;
canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

name: errors
comments: Throws an error because 'function Increment' is closed by non-matching 'end Incremen;'

canonical_solution.src/increment.ads:
function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;

function Increment (X : Integer) return Integer
with Post => Increment'Result = X + 1;
